thread.section_title: Bundle Stars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bundle Stars | www.bundlestars.com | 5 of 925
thread.title: Grant

author: Grant
title: Grant
text: I've been purchasing bundles on bundlestars for a couple years now and I've never received anything but the best deals on great game titles. I've ended up playing some truly amazing games that I never would have otherwise given the time of day just because they were included in a bundle I got. If you are looking for a way to increase your library size, this is a great way to do it.
